txt.en: You have struck the training-dummy with Penetrating Shot
Your trainer wants you to use your new skills to prove that you are ready to face the many dangers that exist in the world.

'Even in this refuge, there are threats that we must confront. You will need to know how to defend yourself and push back these threats.

'If you wish to survive, you must learn skills from others, like myself. We can guide you through your training and help you to become stronger.

'Learn the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> from me and show me that my teaching has given you mastery by striking the training-dummy nearby.'

HINT:

Hunters need <rgb=#ffff00>Focus</rgb> to use some of their special shots, and <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> is such a skill.  Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Quick Shot</rgb> ability until you have <rgb=#ffff00>3 Focus</rgb> points, then use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>.

You should speak with the trainer again and learn the skill <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>. Use your new skill on the training-dummy nearby. 

<rgb=#00ff00>NOTE: Use the trainer and select Train Hunter Skills to open the skill selection panel. Left-click on a skill to highlight it and then left-click the Train button at the bottom of the skill selection panel -- or double-click the skill -- and you will successfully purchase the skill.</rgb>

HINT:

Hunters need <rgb=#ffff00>Focus</rgb> to use some of their special shots, and <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> is such a skill.  Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Quick Shot</rgb> ability until you have <rgb=#ffff00>3 Focus</rgb> points, then use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>.
'Yes, I sensed that you were well-prepared, [placeholder]. \n\n'Speak with Bolli and tell him that I believe you are ready.'
The Hunter Trainer is in Frerin's Court.\n\nNow that you have successfully used your newly-learned skill, return to your trainer and tell him of your success.
Tell Bolli that you have finished preparing for battle.

'Strike the training-dummy with your new skill and return to me. We must make certain that you are prepared to stand against the dangers of Middle-earth.'

HINT:

Hunters need <rgb=#ffff00>Focus</rgb> to use some of their special shots, and <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb> is such a skill.  Use your <rgb=#00ff00>Quick Shot</rgb> ability until you have <rgb=#ffff00>3 Focus</rgb> points, then use <rgb=#00ff00>Penetrating Shot</rgb>.
'Yes, I knew that you were well prepared [placeholder]. \n\n'Speak with Bolli and tell him that I believe you are ready.'
'I will teach you more when you are ready to learn, for the moment you should speak with Bolli.'
Strike the training-dummy with Penetrating Shot
Talk to the Hunter Trainer at Frerin's Court
